attributes.action: make it law, that   anyone who is drunk and breaches the peace in public, can before a court of law be jailed for a maximum of (42) days.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have seen on television the heavy police presence required for drunken and disorderly behaviour. The magistrate courts should be allowed to jail serious drunken offenders (assaulting a police officer)and compound their sentences for recurring offences. Send a clear message to the public demonstrating and enforcing zero leineancy.
